#summary Set up test and dev environment of MILARQ on Naxos

= Install TDB =

{{{
mkdir /mnt/data
mkdir /mnt/data/tdb
cd /mnt/data

wget http://downloads.sourceforge.net/jena/TDB-0.6.0.zip?modtime=1225187084&big_mirror=0
ls
unzip TDB-0.6.0.zip 
ls
mv TDB-0.6.0 /usr/local
rm /usr/local/tdb
ln -s /usr/local/TDB-0.6.0 /usr/local/tdb

export TDBROOT=/usr/local/tdb
export PATH=$TDBROOT/bin:$PATH
chmod -R a+x /usr/local/tdb
tdbloader --help

#
# tdbloader looks ok, try loading
#
tdbloader --verbose --loc=/mnt/data/tdb/bdgp_20081030 /mnt/tmp/bdgp-images-all-20081030.nt >> /var/log/tdbloader.20110104.log

}}}
